title: "Cytiva licenses Allen Institute's advanced machine learning technology"
excerpt: "Cytiva and the Allen Institute have entered into a license agreement to integrate the Allen Institute's machine learning technology with Cytiva's microscopy and image analysis systems to advance the development of cell imaging innovations."
